name: blue-orb
effect: Causes kyogre to appear in the embedded tower.
short_effect: Summons Kyogre to the Embedded Tower.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A blue, glowing orb said to contain an ancient power.
flavor_text.emerald: A blue, glowing orb said to contain an ancient power.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: An orb that glows blue. It is said to contain an incredible power from ancient times.
